abstract: North Korea accuses South Korea of kidnapping 13 North Korean citizens who defected to South; South Korea dismisses North's demands for repatriation of defectors, who were working in North Korean-run restaurant in China.

headline.print_headline: North Korea Threatens South Over 13 Defectors
headline.main: North Korea Threatens South Korea Over 13 Defectors

snippet: The North on Tuesday warned the South that it would “face unimaginable serious consequences and severe punishment” if it did not repatriate the group.
lead_paragraph: The North on Tuesday warned the South that it would “face unimaginable serious consequences and severe punishment” if it did not repatriate the group.
